text: Bakau LRT Station is a light rail transit station in Sengkang, Singapore. It is part of the Sengkang LRT Line. It is on the east loop. It opened on 18 January 2003. == Name == A type of wood called bakau were used in buildings in the past. It suggests a strong foundation of the station. == Sources == == Other websites == https://www.sbstransit.com.sg Category:Sengkang Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Bakau LRT Station
